content: welcome the winter with this adorable snowman coaster perfect for using under a cup of hot cocoa the pattern includes single thickness double thickness and felt backed options this is the twenty-third pattern in the 7th annual christmas in july make along with underground crafter 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round crocheting flat in row increasing joining with whipstitch includes video tutorial starting with magic magic_ring embellishing with embroidery includes link to tutorials **skill level** easy **finished size** coaster 5 13 cm **materials** queensland collection coastal cotton fine yarn 100% cotton 3 5 oz/100 g 350 yd/320 m 1 skein each in 2003 porcelain ca 2001 jet cb and 2023 persimmon cc *or approximately 55 yd 50 5 m in ca 36 yd 33 m in cb and 2 yd 2 m in cc in any fine weight cotton yarn* for the single thickness version you can make 6-7 coasters from the 3 skeins of yarn for the double thickness version you can make 3-4 coasters from the 3 skeins of yarn us size 7-4 5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* stitch marker yarn needle optional for the felt backed variation you will also need felt sheets and fabric glue **gauge** holding 2 strands of yarn through round 10 in pattern for head = 4 5 11 5 cm diameter *exact gauge is not critical for this project* 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/06/30/7-christmas-in-july-make-along/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/07/24/snowman-coaster-crochet-pattern/
